gloss: Pumba_pum (interjection, used to indicate that something or someone fell)
Upa_Upa (interjection, usually used when asking for or being lifted up)

gloss: (To) Place/ put/ set (same as "colocar", see above)
Cool (as in "great!" or as in the sentence "My friend taught me a cool magic trick.")
At (as in "at night"= à noite) or to the (as in "we go to the fairy"="vamos à feira")
At or to the - Same as "À" (see above), but for masculine nouns (example: "at nightfall"="ao anoitecer")
Above or on (as in "on the table"=em cima da mesa)
The (article before a noun, singular form)
